questions.question: Dad was angry …………………….. me for failing the test.
questions.description: Angry with/at a person for doing something.

questions.question: Why are you angry ………………………… everyone?
questions.description: Angry with/at a person for doing something.

questions.question: To get a taste of your own medicine is to ……………………………
answers: get treated in the same way you have been treating others

questions.question: To go on a wild goose chase is to ………………………
To give someone the cold shoulder is to ………………………
The mangoes on that tree ……………………….. very sour.
questions.description: Here the subject is the plural noun mangoes

questions.question: I wish I ……………………… sing.
questions.description: Past tenses are common after I wish to talk about unrealistic situations.

questions.question: She behaved as if she …………………………. mad.
questions.description: Either could be used here however, were is more common.

questions.question: If I were you, I ………………………. allow her to go.
questions.description: In the second conditional, use a simple past in the if-clause and would + infinitive in the main clause.

questions.question: His mentor and guardian …………………….. his uncle.
questions.description: We use a singular verb here because both nouns refer to the same person.

questions.question: She sounded ……………………………
questions.description: Sound is a copular verb we use adjectives to modify copular verbs.
